channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Fly away! Breeze adds 19 new routes, including several from Florida
item.description: Sometimes you just need to get away. Even if where you are is where others head to when they want to get away.

item.title: Open kitchen shelves may look great, Marni says, but are they for you?
item.description: I know it’s tempting. You see those clean, uncluttered open shelves in kitchens, with their matching ceramic dishes, beautifully staged glassware, lots of negative space, and you think, “Why not? If my kitchen had open shelving, my belongings would look great, too! Plus, everything would be so easy to reach.”

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: 5 best things to do in Sarasota area this weekend (July 31-Aug. 3)
item.description: Don’t let the heat slow you down — there’s too muchfun happening around Sarasota and Manateethis weekend.

item.title: Here's the 2025 team-by-team Sarasota and Manatee high school football schedules
item.description: The 2025 high school football season begins with Florida High School Athletic Association Kickoff Classics on Aug. 14. The regular season begins Aug. 21 and runs through Oct. 31 (with the exception of IMG which will play into November) with most teams playing 10 games in 11 weeks.

item.title: Florida Lottery Mega Millions, Jackpot Triple Play…
item.description: TheFlorida Lotteryoffers several draw games for those hoping to win one of the available jackpots. Here’s a look at the winning numbers for games played on Friday, Aug. 1, 2025

item.title: Costco's grand opening in The Villages getting close…
item.description: It's almost here. A newCostcolocation is about to open in Florida, one of several in the works.

item.title: Trump White House ballroom: A look back at Mar-a-Lago's…
item.description: Twenty years after the opening of the Grand Ballroom at President Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago Club in Palm Beach, Trump announced another new ballroom on a grand scale —this time at the White House.

item.title: Football Recruiting 2026: Florida high school summer…

item.description: The Herald-Tribune has gone back and documented the area football teams that have won state championships.

item.title: Sunny weather and daytime storms forecast in Sarasota this weekend
item.description: A slight reprieve fromblazing hot temperatures in Sarasota and Manateeis in the forecast this weekend, thanks tothunderstorms expected to help cool temperaturesdown to the norm.

item.title: Mangrove Rangers study mangrove health on Sarasota and Manatee coast
item.description: A group of advocates called theMangrove Rangersare using drones to document the health of mangrove forests in Sarasota Bay and advocate for better local protection of the key natural resources by Manatee and Sarasota counties.
